data.title: A Top Owl Drone Retake
data.description: Use this Owl Drone to clear out A Drop and create windows of opportunity for your team in other commonly held angles on Site.

data.title: B Site Retake Recon Bolt from C Waterfall on Rotate
data.description: Use this Recon Bolt to support your team's efforts to retake B Site, while rotating from C toward B.
